original_text: For as soon as the captains of the chariots saw that it was not the king of Israel, they turned back from pursuing him.
korean_text: 병거의 지휘관들이 그가 이스라엘 왕이 아님을 보고 추격을 그치고 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: For as soon as the captains of the chariots saw
that it was not the king of Israel
they turned back from pursuing him
